archimate:BusinessProcess.name: SYS.4.BP4 Integrate system items
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Integrate the system items to an integrated system according to the system integration strategy. NOTE 5: The system integration can be performed step wise integrating system items (e.g. the hardware elements as prototype hardware, peripherals (sensors and actuators), the mechanics and integrated software) to produce a system consistent with the system architectural design.
